Package io.goobi.viewer.model.cms

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CMSMediaHolder
    Any object which may directly contain a CMSMediaItem.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CategorizableTranslatedSelectable<T>
    A TranslatedSelectable which may also contain a list of categories
    CMSCategory
    CMSCategory class.
    CMSCollection
    A class representing persistent configurations for a collection.
    CMSCollectionTranslation
    A persistence object holding a translated String value
    CMSContentItem
    This class represents both template content configuration items and instance items of actual pages.
    CMSContentItemTemplate
    A contentItem to be used in a CMSPage template.
    CMSMediaItem
    CMSMediaItem class.
    CMSMediaItemMetadata
    CMSMediaItemMetadata class.
    CMSNavigationItem
    CMSNavigationItem class.
    CMSNavigationManager
    CMSNavigationManager class.
    CMSPage
    CMSPage class.
    CMSPage.PageComparator  
    CMSPageLanguageVersion
    Content instance of a CMS page for a particular language.
    CMSPageLanguageVersionComparator
    Sorts CMSPageLanguageVersions so that the version for the given locale is at the beginning of the Collection, followed by the given defaultLocale, followed by the English and German locale, followed by all others in alphabetical order.
    CMSPageTemplate
    Page templates are read from XML configuration files and are not stored in the DB.
    CMSPageTemplateEnabled
    Persistence class for the enabled/disabled status of a CMSPageTemplate (which is itself not persisted in the DB).
    CMSProperty
    CMSProperty class.
    CMSRecordNote
    Class holding a formatted text related to a single PI which may be edited in the admin/cms-backend and displayed in a (sidebar) widget
    CMSSidebarElement
    CMSSidebarElement class.
    CMSSidebarElementWithQuery
    CMSSidebarElementWithQuery class.
    CMSSidebarElementWithSearch
    CMSSidebarElementWithSearch class.
    CMSSidebarManager
    CMSSidebarManager class.
    CMSSlider
    Class to persist sliders ("slideshows") created in CMS backend
    CMSStaticPage
    CMSStaticPage class.
    CMSTemplateManager
    CMSTemplateManager class.
    PageList
    A list of strings with some convenience methods.
    Selectable<T>
    An entity holding an object which can be selected or deselected
    SelectableNavigationItem
    A CMSNavigationItem which can be selected and deselected.
    TranslatedSelectable<T>
    A Selectable which may also hold a locale to indicate the currently visible language/translation
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CMSContentItem.CMSContentItemType
    The different types if content items.
    CMSMediaItem.Priority  
    CMSNavigationItem.DisplayRule  
    CMSPageLanguageVersion.CMSPageStatus  
    CMSSidebarElement.WidgetMode  
    CMSSlider.SourceType  
    ContentItemMode
    Optional property of a ContentItem within a template Allows additional control about which fields are shown in the cms-backend for this item.
    PageValidityStatus
    PageValidityStatus class.
    SidebarElementType
    SidebarElementType class.
    SidebarElementType.Category
